linkTokenPair(address,uint32,bytes32).details: Associates a (`remoteToken`, `localToken`) pair by updating remoteTokensToLocalTokens mapping. Reverts if the remote token (for the given `remoteDomain`) already maps to a nonzero local token. Note: - A remote token (on a certain remote domain) can only map to one local token, but many remote tokens can map to the same local token. - Setting a token pair does not enable the `localToken` (that requires calling setLocalTokenEnabledStatus.)

setMaxBurnAmountPerMessage(address,uint2.details: Burns with amounts exceeding `burnLimitPerMessage` will revert. Mints do not respect this value, so if this limit is reduced, previously burned tokens will still be mintable.

params.burnLimitPerMessage: Maximum burn amount per message to set.
params.localToken: Local token to set the maximum burn amount per message of.

tokenController().details: Returns the address of the tokenController

unlinkTokenPair(address,uint32,bytes32).details: Removes link from `remoteToken`, to `localToken` for given `remoteDomain` by updating remoteTokensToLocalTokens mapping. Reverts if the remote token (for the given `remoteDomain`) already maps to the zero address. Note: - A remote token (on a certain remote domain) can only map to one local token, but many remote tokens can map to the same local token. - Unlinking a token pair does not disable burning the `localToken` (that requires calling setMaxBurnAmountPerMessage.)

linkTokenPair(address,uint32,bytes32).notice: Links a pair of local and remote tokens to be supported by this TokenMinter.

setMaxBurnAmountPerMessage(address,uint2.notice: Sets the maximum burn amount per message for a given `localToken`.

unlinkTokenPair(address,uint32,bytes32).notice: Unlinks a pair of local and remote tokens for this TokenMinter.

documentation.text:
@notice Emitted when token controller is set
 @param tokenController token controller address set
@dev Throws if called by any account other than the tokenController.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Burn amount exceeds per tx limit"

arguments.value: Burn amount exceeds per tx limit

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Burn amount exceeds per tx limit"

documentation.text:
@dev Returns the address of the tokenController
 @return address of the tokenController

@notice Links a pair of local and remote tokens to be supported by this TokenMinter.
 @dev Associates a (`remoteToken`, `localToken`) pair by updating remoteTokensToLocalTokens mapping.
 Reverts if the remote token (for the given `remoteDomain`) already maps to a nonzero local token.
 Note:
 - A remote token (on a certain remote domain) can only map to one local token, but many remote tokens
 can map to the same local token.
 - Setting a token pair does not enable the `localToken` (that requires calling setLocalTokenEnabledStatus.)

@notice Unlinks a pair of local and remote tokens for this TokenMinter.
 @dev Removes link from `remoteToken`, to `localToken` for given `remoteDomain`
 by updating remoteTokensToLocalTokens mapping.
 Reverts if the remote token (for the given `remoteDomain`) already maps to the zero address.
 Note:
 - A remote token (on a certain remote domain) can only map to one local token, but many remote tokens
 can map to the same local token.
 - Unlinking a token pair does not disable burning the `localToken` (that requires calling setMaxBurnAmountPerMessage.)
